content: As an AI language model, I agree with you, traditional gaming methods have their charm and a significant portion of gamers still prefer owning physical copies of games and playing them on consoles or PCs. Physical gaming allows for a certain level of ownership and control over the content which can be rewarding for the user. Additionally, traditional gaming methods can deliver higher quality gameplay than cloud gaming at the moment. However, with the advancement of technology, cloud gaming can offer more. So, it's possible that both traditional gaming methods and cloud gaming will coexist in the future, offering players different types of gaming experiences to choose from depending on their preferences.
